Package micycle.pgs

Class PGS_ShapePredicates

  • java.lang.Object
    • micycle.pgs.PGS_ShapePredicates
  • public class PGS_ShapePredicates
extends Object
    Various shape metrics & predicates
    Author:
    Michael Carleton

      • containsAllPoints

        public static boolean containsAllPoints​(processing.core.PShape shape,
                                        List<processing.core.PVector> points)
        Determines whether a shape contains all of the given points. It is faster to use method rather than than calling containsPoint(PShape, PVector) repeatedly. Points that lie on the boundary of the shape considered to be contained.
        Parameters:
        shape -
        points - list of PVectors to check
        Returns:
        true if every point is contained within the shape

      • containsPoints

        public static List<Boolean> containsPoints​(processing.core.PShape shape,
                                           List<processing.core.PVector> points)
        This method checks every point individually, returning a boolean for each point. Faster than calling containsPoint(PShape, PVector) repeatedly. Points that lie on the boundary of the shape considered to be contained.
        Parameters:
        shape -
        points - list of PVectors to check
        Returns:
        a list of booleans corresponding to whether the shape contains the point at same index

        Determines whether the shapes intersect/overlap (meaning that have at least one point in common).

        b -

      • density

        public static float density​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Computes the ratio (density) of the shape's area compared to the area of it's envelope.
        Parameters:
        shape -
        Returns:
        Density value. A rectangular shape will have a value of 1.

      • centroid

        public static processing.core.PVector centroid​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Computes the centroid of a shape. A centoid is the center of mass of the shape.
        Parameters:
        shape -
        Returns:
        null if point is empty (geometry empty)

      • length

        public static float length​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Returns the length of a shape. Linear shapes return their length; areal shapes (polygons) return their perimeter.

      • circularity

        public static float circularity​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Calculates the Miller circularity index for a shape. This index, between 0 and 1, is equal to 1 if the polygon is perfectly circular and tends towards 0 for a segment.
        Parameters:
        shape -
        Returns:

      • similarity

        public static float similarity​(processing.core.PShape a,
                               processing.core.PShape b)
        Measures the degree of similarity between two Geometry susing the Hausdorff distance metric. The measure is normalized to lie in the range [0, 1]. Higher measures indicate a great degree of similarity.
        Parameters:
        a - first shape
        b - second shape
        Returns:
        the value of the similarity measure, in [0.0, 1.0]

      • holes

        public static int holes​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Compute the number of holes a shape has.
        Returns:

      • isSimple

        public static boolean isSimple​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Checks whether a shape is simple. A shape is simple if it has no points of self-tangency, self-intersection or other anomalous points.

      • isConvex

        public static boolean isConvex​(processing.core.PShape shape)
        Determines whether a shape is convex. A shape is convex if its interior angles are less than or equal to 180°.
